bug.short_desc: Fallback handling of "mobile" mode in non-Webkit browsers incomplete

long_desc.thetext:
(In reply to comment #0) > If the playground is opened in a non-Webkit browser like Firefox, it (as > expected) switches to "desktop" mode, but (unexpectedly) no code gets > displayed: > http://demo.qooxdoo.org/devel/playground/index.html#mode=mobile > Suggestion: Instead lets make it display the first desktop sample.
Fixed that with r28331.
> Another issue in that context: When manually choosing a desktop sample in the > use case above and then using the browser's back button, an error is displayed > in the editor area: > // Could not handle URL parameter! > // SyntaxError: JSON.parse: unexpected character
This was sure related to the uncaught exception explained in the first part of the bug.
